  • Methodendetails

    • getMonsters

      Map<org.bukkit.entity.Monster,org.bukkit.entity.Player> getMonsters(org.bukkit.entity.EntityType entityType)
      Gets the map of monsters targeting players for the given EntityType.
      Parameter:
      entityType - EntityType of the monsters.
      Gibt zurück:
      Map of monsters targeting players.

    • updateMonsters

      void updateMonsters(org.bukkit.entity.EntityType entityType, Map<org.bukkit.entity.Monster,org.bukkit.entity.Player> monsters)
      Updates the internal monster map for the given EntityType.
      Parameter:
      entityType - EntityType of the monsters.
      monsters - Bew Nap of monsters targeting players.

    • registerAttack

      void registerAttack(org.bukkit.entity.EntityType type, Class<? extends MonsterAttack<?>> attackClazz)
      Registers a new MonsterAttack for the given EntityType.
      Parameter:
      type - EntityType of the monster.
      attackClazz - Class of the MonsterAttack to register.

    • unregisterAttack

      void unregisterAttack(Class<? extends MonsterAttack<?>> attackClazz)
      Unregisters a registered MonsterAttack.
      Parameter:
      attackClazz - Class of the MonsterAttack to unregister.

    • unregisterAllAttacks

      void unregisterAllAttacks()
      Unregisters all registered MonsterAttacks.
